name: BEST WESTERN New Oregon Motel

reviews.title: really really bad
reviews.text: rooms were smelly and carpet stained. staff was rude and could care less. car was broken into in parking lot.. acosted by homeless types in hallway...

reviews.title: Great staff, great room
reviews.text: Since our son started UofO we have stayed at the New Oregon numerous times. The staff has always been friendly and helpful. The rooms are quiet and clean. The staff in the breakfast room has always been nice.They do, however, need to put a phone & coffee maker in each room of the one bedroom suite.Other than that, it is a perfect place to stay if you have a child at the UofO.GO DUCKS!

reviews.title: Very Nice Accomodations
reviews.text: An excellent location near college. Also, we were close the Hertz drop-off by the Amtrak station. The balcony overlooked a river-side park - unexpected but nice. The indoor pool was large and clean. The room was very clean and quiet. Very satisfied.

aka: Best Western New Oregon Hotel Eugene
